Key: All right, I should leave soon.

Huh, you're going out, Shido? I wanted you to go to
the market for me.

Seriously, you have to stop treating me like your
servant. I'm going on a date with Kaguya and Yuzuru
today... It's my day off.
Ah, that's right. Hmm... I see.
Wh-What?

Nothingggg. Well, why don't you take good care of
them. THEY are your TWO adorable, adorable girlfriends,
aren't they?
I-I know that. You don't have to tell me.

(For some reason it feels so cold. But I decided that
I'm going to take care of Kaguya and Yuzuru. I'm not
going to let this get to me!)

Anyways, I'm on my way out. I can't let my adorable
girlfriends wait, right?
I see. Later. Oh... Shido. I have a favor to ask you.
Wh-What is it? Why are you all serious?

I want you to buy me pudding on the way back. I'll
let you choose the kind... but you should already
know.
Okay. Well, I'll be off, then!
Byeee. Be home before dinner!

(I think I heard Kotori laughing inside the house. Do
I look that weird today? Well... I guess I do.)

Ah. Maybe I'm nervous. Even after we started dating,
we've rarely been on dates on my days off.

(Once I became conscious of it, I couldn't stop
thinking about it. But it's fine. I did come up with a
plan. It'll be fine... I think.)

(Well... no use in thinking about it now. Thanks to
Kotori, I got rid of my nerves a bit...)
All right, I'm heading out!

...I arrived over 30 minutes early. It's better than
being late, but if I wander around, it'll seem like I
feel bad about getting here too early.
I'm sure they aren't here yet.
Calling... Shido.
Oh, Yuzuru.

Arrived. Sorry for the wait. Yuzuru left pretty
early... Have I made you wait?
Oh no, I just got here...

(Hm? Why does it seem like Yuzuru is out of breath?
Did she run?)

Did you run? It's earlier than our meeting time. You
didn't have to rush.

Negative. That's wrong. I saw that you were waiting,
so I just ran here.
O-Oh. I see. Sorry for making you run.

Focused. Yuzuru was the one who ran, so it's not your
fault, Shido.

I see. Thanks. Seriously, you're as cute as always,
Yuzuru.

Appreciation. Thank you. I'm happy to hear you say
that.
Ah. Hahaha.

(I feel so uneasy. I feel like I can hear Kotori
laughing at me. Her voice is ringing in my ear.)

Oh, come to think of it, is it just you today? Kaguya
isn't with you...?

Affirmative. Since it's a date, Kaguya suggested we
leave home separately.

Ah, I see. But... wouldn't normal couples who live
together do that?

Agreed. But I do hear that the vibe is what's
important. And besides, you can pretty much say that
Yuzuru and Kaguya are dating as well.

I-I see... I guess since the three of us are dating,
you could interpret it that way...

(It seems a bit out there, but since we still have
time, we can just hang out. I'm sure she won't be too
late.)

(Yuzuru and I talked for about 20 minutes, but Kaguya
was still nowhere in sight.)

You think Kaguya is going to come on time? She knows
that you left the house already, right?
Reminiscence. Right. I did tell her.
Silence...

...She won't be late, will she? I mean, she's the one
who suggested it, but she's going to be late?

Negative. I'm sure it'll be all right. See look, she's
arrived.

(I looked toward where Yuzuru pointed, and indeed
saw Kaguya crossing the intersection.)

...Keke, I made you wait, Shido. Coming early and
waiting for your master... I certainly taught my
servant well.
Morning, Kaguya. You look adorable in your outfit.
Wha?!

Attention. Shido, Kaguya is blushing. Let's praise her
more and enjoy her reaction.
I-I'm not blushing! A-And what are you doing, Yuzuru?!

Monologue. Yuzuru will disappear into Shido's shadow
for a while. Kaguya, why don't you converse with Shido
for a bit?

Yuzuru, what are you doing? Ah... Well Kaguya, I guess
you left a little early.

I mean it's a date. It's not nice to make you wait,
right Shido?

(I'm sure she knew that Yuzuru came before she did.
Well, I guess I shouldn't say that.)
So you came early for me, Kaguya? Thanks.

Hmph... It's only obvious. That's the role of a
master.
I see, that makes me happy.
H-Hey... Don't pet meeee...
You're cute, Kaguya.
Sh-Shut up...!
Oh, you don't want me to do it anymore?
Grr...

...Taunt. What's the matter, Kaguya? Yuzuru was
totally alone with Shido for 30 minutes.

Wh-What did you say?! No, it's fine... I'm fine with
that!

Hey, Yuzuru... It's not like we were doing anything.
You don't have to egg her on!

Unfortunate. I thought it would be fun seeing Kaguya
blush.
Forget it!
Keke... All right, Shido. Why don't we head out?
Kaguya, you're so fast at changing the pace...
Shut up! Let's just go!
Agreed. Let's go Shido. Time is limited.
All right, leave it to me!

So we're here, but... Are you guys okay with this
place? I mean, we can drop by here after school.

I don't mind. Hehe... It makes me boil. I can do
whatever I please for as long as I want, right?

Well, it's however much our wallet will allow, but I
would say we have more time now to enjoy than if we
were to come here after school.
Exaltation. This place does make me feel giddy.
I didn't expect that. You like the arcade too, Yuzuru?

Affirmative. Yuzuru and I are 2-in-1. Whatever Kaguya
likes, Yuzuru likes as well. And we can compete with
each other.

(I see, come to think of it... I guess this place is
perfect for that.)
All right, then let me join the battle today!

Wh-What?! Shido, you're going to plunge yourself in
the midst of battle with the Yamais?
Oh, is that not okay?

Analysis. Depending on the results of the battle,
we were going to determine who could do
whatever they wanted to Shido.
I see.

(Ah, so naturally I'm their prize. Well, I guess it's not
just today that they've done this.)

Keke. No problem. The heavens smile upon me. I'm
going to compete with Shido and emerge victorious.

Agreed. The winner can do what they want with Shido
afterwards.
W-Well, if you guys are fine with that, then I'm okay.
Then it's set. The first battle will be... THAT!
(For the first competition, Kaguya chose...)

A racing game, huh? Where we go inside the booth and
control the handles?

Indeed. For the Yamais as fast as a gale, this game is
nothing to us.
I see. So if you're going to tell me about it, then...?

Of course, Kaguya Yamai will be your opponent. Sorry,
Yuzuru. It's decided that I will be victorious.

Cheering. Shido, good luck. You must not lose until
you compete with me.
Hahaha... Well, I'll do my best.
(And the fateful coin was put in!)
(The race began, and Kaguya started with a dash!)

Hehe... What's the matter, Shido? The one who takes
control of the beginning will take control of the
race. This battle is pretty much mine.
*grunt* It's not over yet!

(As Kaguya said, this game is great for competing.
It's hard to close the gap. As a result, any advantage
won in the beginning becomes significant.)
Suggestion. Shido, don't give up. Attack Kaguya.
Got it. I'll aim for her rounding the corner!
I can do it!
KAKAKAKA! Futile attempt!
Damn, she blocked it!

Analysis. Kaguya's car is accurately defending the
line you're trying to get in, Shido.

(I didn't know Kaguya was this good. She must play
a lot of racing games.)
Worried. Shido, at this rate...
No, I'm fine. This is all part of my plan...
Wha...t?! Shido, what did you just say?

Hehehe. Just what I said. Now let's go to the next
corner!
*grunt* Do you have a plan of attack? I won't let you!

(Kaguya blocked the road once again. But... that's
fine.)

To be in the front always means you're facing
pressure. If you try to block the road...

Wh-What do you mean? What is Shido talking about?
*gasp* Oh, no! Did I cut my wheels too much?!

(Yup, these kinds of accidents occur often. Kaguya's
car started to fumble.)

Confident! Shido, now's your chance! Turn the handle
to the right!
MINEEEE!
Th-This can't be. I...

(Kaguya lost speed due to the slip, so if I go with
it, it'll be difficult to close the distance. I am
always a safe driver. Kaguya, it's game over for you.)
What? This can't be. How could I lose so easily...

Understand. Shido, you purposefully let Kaguya gain
an advantage in the beginning, didn't you?

Yeah. In a game like this, you have to watch out for
any potential slips. It's difficult to handle the
turns consistently, so it's easy to change the tide.

I see. That's why you let me go ahead, and then
you were banking on the final curve. *grunt*... And
I totally fell for it.

Pointer. Kaguya, you asked for a rematch twice and
you've lost a total of three times. So I don't think
his tactic is even an issue.

*grunt*...! Shut up, shut up! Shido, Yuzuru is bullying
meeee...
Hahaha. Well then...
Affirmative. Yuzuru's turn next.
Got it. So... What do you want to play?

Selection. I've already decided. The stage of our
battle will be that.
(Yuzuru pointed at―!)
Air hockey, huh? This is another classic.

Yuzuru, I won't let you lose. You bear the Yamai name,
and you will defeat Shido. It's a must!

Undertaking. Leave it to me. We Yamais are Hurricane
Children who control the wind. I will never lose in
anything with the name air"."

(Uh... wouldn't you say air hockey has nothing to do
with that?)

(Well, whatever... So our air hockey battle will now
begin!)
Defeat. I'm sorry, Kaguya. I lost.

Well, I don't blame you. I mean, I have longer arms
than you do, Yuzuru, so I have a wider range I can
cover.

(I'm also not going to tell her that her chest was in
the way. Not that I was watching...)
Yuzuru, I had faith in you...!

Guilty. I apologize, Kaguya. The Yamai Sisters have
been completely defeated...
Mm. So what becomes of your battle?

Hm. Today's battle is a tie... Oh wait, no, that's not
right.
Affirmative. I know. Today's winner is Shido.

*grunt*... Very well. Shido, you have the right to do
as you please with the Yamai Sisters. Feel free to do
whatever you want.

Huh? Oh, I see. Hmm... then what should I have you
two do...?

*grunt* Shido... What kind of disgrace do you plan for
the Yamais...?!

Resolve. I am prepared to do anything, no matter how
embarrassing it may be. I won't be defeated by your
punishment.
(What is up with them...)
You guys... Oh, I know. Let's do that.
That's...

Confirming. Those are photo stickers. You're okay with
just that, Shido?

Yeah. I want to have memories from today, so I
thought we could take them together. Is that okay?

That is one giant projection machine. Very well, I
shall acquiesce.

Servile. If you've decided Shido, of course I won't
have an issue with it.

(...I'm so glad. Seems like I was able to get away
with it.)

(All right, I need to get inside and pay. But I don't
really know how to work the machine.)
Do you think this is good?

Affirmative. It seems like we will be maneuvering
that button. You've not done much of these either,
Shido?

Well, I feel like girls do this more. Guys wouldn't go
unless they had a girlfriend.

I see. Then... From now on, we will do it as much as
you want.
Affirmative. Let's make lots of memories, Shido.
Oh, for sure. All right... Let's take the photo.
Hm. This image lacks playfulness.

Affirmative. I mean this is Shido's prize, so we need
to make it more of a prize.

What are you two talking about? Let's take the next
shot.
Hmm... Then let's go with that. Shido.
Smirk. Please take the photo.
(What... are they talking about?)
Oh well. Here I go, guys.
Oh... Wh-What...

Hehehe. Perfect. Shido, that was your prize from
earlier. Accept it.

Gift. This is a victory kiss from the Yamai Sisters.
Please accept it.
Y-You guys...

(Gosh, I can never let my guard down when I'm with
them.)

Oh! We can doodle on it! Heh... Then I will show you
what the Devil King's writing looks like.

Understood. Then Yuzuru will handle this one. Here
you go, Shido...
Gosh... Okay, fine.
(And so I saved the photo stickers with their kiss.)

(As I doodled with Kaguya and Yuzuru, I was thinking
how nice it would be to have fun days like this
continue on forever.)
